Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 93rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2018...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to MON: RF Jc Salomon, P Isaac Baker, P Saul Trejo, P Kenneth Cram, P Lee Wyrick. Going to CIN: P Geronimo Larosa)...
Earned first career win on 5/20/2020...
Injured on 8/15/2022 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Montreal to Houston on 5/31/2023 (Going to HOU: CF Christopher Cerrato, P Kenneth Cram. Going to MON: C John Hartsfield)...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 7/6/2023.
